column4: um, i'm worried about something that happened during my installing ubuntu
it said a file was corrupt and it couldn't download a package
i tole it "continue" and its still installing but um ... was that bad ??
um ... i dont kno ... should be the latest PPC ubuntu
Do you remember anything more about the error? ( a package is like an intaller for a specific part of ubuntu )
ah
wish i did
i'm such a noob - should have written it down
If ubuntu comes up like it's supposed to - is there an easy way to get it to check itself and download any files it might be missing ??
what i've noticed thus far is that ubuntu falls far short of its goal
or else it has the wrong goal
The goal ought to be to make a "Free Software" OS that does everything that Windows does and is just as easy to understand and use as Windows is.
Yeah, but it gets better every version, and for the record I find Ubuntu MUCH easier than windows
oh crap
See also http://linux.oneandoneis2.org/LNW.htm
it says "Warning: failure while configuring base packages. This will be attempted 5 times"
yeah windows has bugs
windows *is* a bug
ubutntu apparently sees my computer as "unclean"
whoah dude, this is getting Biblical
heh, i've never even heard of that
o rly? LOL
Close, it detected that your CD was "unclean" hence the corrupt package :)
